author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Golden Leaf India Awards: Southern Tea Competition received 155 entries this year from 52 tea estates and companies, according to a press release from the United Planters’ Association of Southern India.

The competition is an annual event by the association and the Tea Board of India. The first level screening of teas was held on March 12 at Coonoor and six-member panel evaluated the teas. The final tasting session will be held in Dubai from April 5 to 7.
title: Golden Leaf India awards
